articles.author: nutraingredients-asia.com
articles.title: Beetroot juice intake found to improve muscle recovery among female athletes after high-pressure training – Iran RCT - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: Beetroot juice supplementation among female volleyball players was found to improve muscle endurance and pain reduction after high-pressure training, says researchers.
